name: Halloween Fruit Snacks
author: Lola
summary: If you are concerned that your kids eat too many sweets during Halloween, try these non-candy snacks. Dried and fresh fruit like apricots, mangoes, and grapes are so much more appealing when they look at you!
ingredients: ½ pound seedless green grapes, halved
directions: Arrange apricots and peaches on a platter
Skewer a few grapes on a toothpick vertically and the last one horizontally (for the head)
Mix confectioners' sugar with water to make a thin, slightly sticky icing
Use icing to glue 2 candy eyeballs on each piece of fruit and on the horizontal "head" of the grape caterpillar
